# PLAYER::SET_WANTED_LEVEL_MULTIPLIER

## Summary
Sets the chance that the player will get a wanted level.

## Parameters
* **FLOAT** multiplier:
1.0f is the default value and it will automatically be reset when MISSION_HAS_FINISHED is called.
A value of 2.0f means that the playerâ€™s wanted level will go up twice as fast when he commits crimes.

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
If you set the wanted multiplier to a low value 0.01 and a cop see you shoot a ped in face you wil still get a wanted level.
